commits.message:
EUCA-12933 - euca-run-workflow shouldn't call 'ls -l' to check for a file

Description:
 - Change subprocess call to os.path.exists call

Changes:
 - Added WF_InvalidInputPath exception
 - Raise WF_InvalidInputPath if the path does not exist
 - Catch WF_InvalidInputPath exception and exit with an error

Testing:
 - negative manual testing of the control logic (error when the path does exist)
